{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_M_FireShotgun2}} '''A_M_FireShotgun2'''
(no parameters)
Does nothing if the calling actor has no valid target. Otherwise, plays the sound "weapons/sshotf" on the WEAPON channel, calls [[A_FaceTarget]], then performs txenty missile-range hitscan attack with a horizontal spread of 11.25° and a vertical spread of 7.125°, each of them inflicting 5d3 damage and spawning a {{Class|BulletPuff}}. This replicates {{Class|SuperShotgun}} [[A_FireShotgun2|fire]]. Finally, it sets the calling actor's special1 field to the current tic count. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ScriptedMarine}} and derived classes.
